original_text: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel: and the years of the life of Kohath were an hundred thirty and three years.
korean_text: 고핫의 아들들은 아므람과 이스할과 헤브론과 웃시엘이요 고핫의 나이는 백삼십삼 세였으며

sentences.original_text: Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel:
and the years of the life of Kohath
were an hundred thirty and three years.
